summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 45th Avenue South, from Brandon Street to Bennett Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and fire hydrants, all in accordance with Resolution No. 8614 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
